0100110111111111 1000101100100011 0 -> sum: 1101100100100010, cout: 0

1100111101100001 0111001001000001 1 -> sum: 0100000110100011, cout: 1
1100000110101100 1011110010001011 1 -> sum: 0111111000111000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
